attributes.action: Declare Keanu Reeves a national treasure despite being Canadian
attributes.additional_details: Not only has he donated millions of his earnings to charitable causes, he continues to be a shining light in an otherwise bleak world. He is a role model to young men around the world and a perfect example of how to treat our fellow humans.
attributes.background: Much like a knighthood, Keanu Reeves should be declared as a national treasure for his continued human decency, acts of good will and empathetic approach to everyone.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action which is the direct responsibility of the Government or Parliament.

We understand that you want Keanu Reeves to be declared a national treasure, but it is up the public, not the Government or Parliament, whether someone is considered a national treasure.

If you would like to nominate Keanu Reeves for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
